post.body: OK #fitfam
REALLY?! #fitfam
We can do it!!!!!!! #fitfam
I was on bedrest and had to have a cerclage and had hyperemesis #fitfam
Me too. I want to lose at least 60 pounds before taking the IUD out and getting preggers again #fitfam
OK, I am going to check now #fitfam
let me know. I will sign up again or reactivate or whatever. #fitfam
Well, I am using WW but I can use Spark too if you want to get back into it. #fitfam
r u still using Spark People? #fitfam
Thank you! #fitfam
Sounds good. We can kick it into gear #fitfam
Um, I am going to need you ALL to nag me. LOL #fitfam
yes we are #fitfam
Ohm, OK, thanks #fitfam
it's just motivation to lose for me. I don't need it for My Fitness Coach, right? #fitfam
I like Daily Plate, but I am back on WW #fitfam
I was going to buy it but was not sure if I neede the board...I am too heavy for the board. LOL #fitfam
I am Momontherise on SParkPeople...add me if you are there #fitfam
no exercising while drunk #fitfam
I'm serious, I have a lot to lose so you can all be my buddy. #fitfam
